name: (dis)connected
description:
You recently made an account on FaceSpace, the most popular social media app on the planet.

You're curious about how this app works and recently discovered influencers, people with super-popular accounts with tons of followers.

Right now, your account feels a little too... normal. You only have a few dozen followers and are curious about what it takes to become an influencer.

It's time for you to navigate this new digital world.
